data.eml:eml: Three new species of striped Ichthyophis (Amphibia: Gymnophiona: Ichthyophiidae) from the northeast Indian states of Manipur and Nagaland

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Kamei, Rachunliu G., Wilkinson, Mark, Gower, David J. (2009): Three new species of striped Ichthyophis (Amphibia: Gymnophiona: Ichthyophiidae) from the northeast Indian states of Manipur and Nagaland. Zootaxa 2267: 26-42, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.190862
